answers.answer: HiWelcome to the MedHelp forum!Evening rise in temperature is generally due to anemia, diabetes, hypothyroid states, overwork, stress and fatigue. It is also seen in diseases like tuberculosis. It can also be due to post viral fatigue. Drink plenty of fluids, eat healthy, take a multivitamin and see if it helps.Please consult your PCP. Take care!
